column4: Hi all .. When I try to reboot or shutdown the box makes it all the way to "Will Reboot Now" (where it normally starts to shutdown and reboot) and stalls for ever .. where can I look to see wtf is going on?
Hi all .. Does anyone know any video editing software that can edit .asf files? My new Cowon A2 records in asf format, but there are some videos that need cut down a bunch ..
thanks I'll give it a try .. I've been trying with cinelerra and avidemux .. with no results .. lol
